channel.title: Getting off to the right start in 2014
channel.description:
If you didn't get as far as you wanted in 2013, these links might make 2014 a better year:
[url=http://zenhabits.net/25-painless-ways-to-free-up-an-hour-a-day-for-your-goals/]25 Painless Ways to Free Up an Hour a Day for Your Goals[/url]
[url=http://thenextweb.com/entrepreneur/2014/01/02/succeed-in-2014/#!rtSY5]How to succeed at building your own product in 2014[/url]
